title: The second ‘Halo’ season has a release date and a teaser trailer
description:

title: Fortnite’s Eminem concert teased the future of the game
description:

title: Fortnite and Lego join forces for ‘survival crafting’ game
description: The next chapter of Fortnite will introduce a new island — but it’s also adding a Lego-themed game experience. Following The Big Bang event, which marked the conclusion of Fortnite OG (and also starred Eminem), developer Epic Games revealed a new in-game experience called Lego Fortnite. It’s described as “a new survival crafting game” that will be available within Fortnite starting on December 7th.

title: The Ember Tumbler is a cool, high-tech travel mug — but it can’t handle the heat
description:
